LanguageData.HAR_NM_R_Weapon_A.label: Hallucinatory Weapons Research I
LanguageData.HAR_NM_R_Weapon_A.description: Create hallucinatory weapons powered by the mental abilities of the Nearmare.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_R_Weapon_B.label: Hallucinatory Weapons Research II
LanguageData.HAR_NM_R_Weapon_B.description: Create more powerful hallucinatory weapons that better use the mental abilities of the Nearmare.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_R_Weapon_C.label: Hallucinatory Weapons Research III
LanguageData.HAR_NM_R_Weapon_C.description: Create incredibly destructive hallucinatory weaponr use the mental abilities of the Nearmare to their fullest.
